# OBJECT::SET_PICKUP_OBJECT_COLLECTABLE_IN_VEHICLE

## Summary
Allows a pickup to be collectable if the player is in a vehicle. This only works for on foot pickups

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
